chapphy60.Description: 60. A brisk walk has sometimes made me feel good all over.

chapphy17.Description: 17. Flowers aren't as beautiful as many people claim.

chapphy20.Description: 20. Trying new foods is something I have always enjoyed.

chapphy13.Description: 13. The sound of rustling leaves has never much pleased me.

chapphy51.Description: 51. The smell of dinner cooking has hardly ever aroused my appetite.

chapphy21.Description: 21. The warmth of an open fireplace hasn't especially soothed and calmed me.

chapphy55.Description: 55. I've never cared to sunbathe; it just makes me hot.

chapphy61.Description: 61. I have been fascinated with the dancing of flames in a fireplace.

chapphy8.Description: 8. I have had very little fun from physical activities like walking, swimming, or sports.

chapphy54.Description: 54. I think that flying a kite is silly.

chapphy5.Description: 5. Dancing, or the idea of it, has always seemed dull to me.

chapphy26.Description: 26. I have had very little desire to try new kinds of foods.

chapphy42.Description: 42. I have seldom cared to sing in the shower.

chapphy14.Description: 14. Sunbathing isn't really more fun than lying down indoors.

chapphy36.Description: 36. I like playing with and petting soft little kittens or puppies.

chapphy24.Description: 24. I have always had a number of favorite foods.

chapphy34.Description: 34. I have often found walks to be relaxing and enjoyable.

chapphy6.Description: 6. I have always found organ music dull and unexciting.

chapphy48.Description: 48. It has always made me feel good when someone I care about reaches out to touch me.

chapphy47.Description: 47. The beauty of sunsets is greatly overrated.

chapphy23.Description: 23. When I have seen a statue, I have had the urge to feel it.

chapphy58.Description: 58. When I'm feeling a little sad, singing has often made me feel happier.

chapphy22.Description: 22. Poets always exaggerate the beauty and joys of nature.

chapphy2.Description: 2. When eating a favorite food, I have often tried to eat slowly to make it last longer.

chapphy31.Description: 31. I have often felt uncomfortable when my friends touch me.

chapphy59.Description: 59. A good soap lather when I'm bathing has sometimes soothed and refreshed me.

chapphy32.Description: 32. I have never found a thunderstorm exhilarating.

chapphy28.Description: 28. I've never cared much about the texture of food.

chapphy10.Description: 10. On hearing a good song, I have seldom wanted to sing along with it.

chapphy37.Description: 37. The sound of organ music has often thrilled me.

chapphy45.Description: 45. After a busy day, a slow walk has often felt relaxing.

chapphy35.Description: 35. The sound of the rain falling on the roof has made me feel snug and secure.

chapphy12.Description: 12. The color that things are painted has seldom mattered to me.

chapphy19.Description: 19. I never wanted to go on any of the rides at an amusement park.

chapphy9.Description: 9. I have seldom enjoyed any kind of sexual experience.

chapphy18.Description: 18. I have always loved having my back massaged.

chapphy7.Description: 7. The taste of food has always been important to me.

chapphy49.Description: 49. I have usually found soft music boring rather than relaxing.

chapphy33.Description: 33. Standing on a high place and looking out over the view is very exciting.

chapphy25.Description: 25. I don't understand why people enjoy looking at the stars at night.

chapphy50.Description: 50. I have usually finished my bath or shower as quickly as possible just to get it over with.

chapphy56.Description: 56. The sounds of a parade have never excited me.

chapphy38.Description: 38. Beautiful scenery has been a great delight to me.

chapphy44.Description: 44. On seeing a soft, thick carpet, I have sometimes had the impulse to take off my shoes and walk barefoot on it.

chapphy40.Description: 40. Sex is okay, but not as much fun as most people claim it is.

chapphy53.Description: 53. Sex is the most intensely enjoyable thing in life.

chapphy1.Description: 1. I have usually found lovemaking to be intensely pleasurable.

chapphy11.Description: 11. I have always hated the feeling of exhaustion that comes from vigorous activity.

chapphy16.Description: 16. I don't know why some people are so interested in music.

chapphy46.Description: 46. The bright lights of a city are exciting to look at.

chapphy27.Description: 27. I never have the desire to take off my shoes and walk through a puddle barefoot.

chapphy43.Description: 43. One food tastes as good as another to me.

chapphy29.Description: 29. When I have walked by a bakery, the smell of fresh bread has often made me hungry.

chapphy30.Description: 30. I have often enjoyed receiving a strong, warm handshake.

chapphy3.Description: 3. I have often enjoyed the feel of silk, velvet, or fur.

chapphy39.Description: 39. The first winter snowfall has often looked pretty to me.

chapphy4.Description: 4. I have sometimes enjoyed feeling the strength in my muscles.

chapphy15.Description: 15. There just are not many things that I have ever really enjoyed doing.

chapphy41.Description: 41. I have sometimes danced by myself just to feel my body move with the music.

chapphy57.Description: 57. It has often felt good to massage my muscles when they are tired or sore.

chapphy52.Description: 52. When I pass by flowers, I have often stopped to smell them.
